article_metadata.description: Ardina is a new startup based in Columbus, Ohio that is introducing a Healthcare benefits program that reduces out-of-pocket costs for commonly used products

og.description: About Commons Health, Inc Ardina, located in Columbus, OH, is a digital based healthcare membership program focused on saving members time, money, and confusion on their daily healthcare needs. Ardina is NOT insurance, but it is a complement to insurance. Ardina provides access to digital healthcare services and discounts to reduce out-of-pocket medical expenses. Learn...  Read more »
